catalog_info.title: Advanced Modern Hebrew I
catalog_info.notes: Conducted in Hebrew. Not open to auditors. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 4042.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Modern Hebrew 120A/120B sequence, or equivalent level of proficiency.
catalog_info.description: This course constitutes the third year of the Modern Hebrew language sequence. The course emphasizes the development of advanced proficiency in all skills. Readings include texts of linguistic and cultural complexity that cover contemporary Israeli literature and culture.
